channel.title: Gui on The Plone Expanse
channel.description: Recent content in Gui on The Plone Expanse

item.title: Moving to Intrepid and KDE 4.1
item.description: I've migrated my laptop (my main workstation, these days) and I've done a complete migration to the KDE 4.1 desktop. Things are not perfect, (on the old KDE 3.5 I'd say things were 99% according to my tastes), but I'm trying to accomodate and find replacements. I didn't like the KDE 4.1 launcher at first and I've even tested Launcelot for a while, but now I'm back to the default menu and I'm starting to like it (on 3.
